column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: descendant. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix desc: <http://example.org/descendant#> .desc:Descendant rdfs:subClassOf rdfs:Resource .desc:hasMother rdf:type rdf:Property ;               rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;               rdfs:range desc:Descendant .desc:hasFather rdf:type rdf:Property ;               rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;               rdfs:range desc:Descendant .desc:hasChild rdf:type rdf:Property ;              rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;              rdfs:range desc:Descendant .desc:name rdf:type rdf:Property ;          rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;          rdfs:range xsd:string .desc:gender rdf:type rdf:Property ;           rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;           rdfs:range xsd:string .desc:birthYear rdf:type rdf:Property ;              rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;              rdfs:range xsd:integer .desc:deathYear rdf:type rdf:Property ;              rdfs:domain desc:Descendant ;              rdfs:range xsd:integer .```
